targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  alert,
  patient_id,
  unit
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE alert IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  systolic_pressure AS "Presión Sistólica",
  diastolic_pressure AS "Presión Diastólica",
  patient_id
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  temperature AS "Temperatura",
  patient_id
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.title: Temperatura corporal a lo largo del tiempo

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  oxygen_saturation AS "Saturación de Oxígeno",
  unit
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  heart_rate AS "Ritmo Cardíaco",
  patient_id
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  blood_glucose AS "Glucosa",
  patient_id
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  patient_id,
  AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate,
  AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature,
  AVG(oxygen_saturation) AS avg_oxygen_saturation,
  AVG(blood_glucose) AS avg_blood_glucose,
  AVG(systolic_pressure) AS avg_systolic_pressure,
  AVG(diastolic_pressure) AS avg_diastolic_pressure
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY patient_id
ORDER BY avg_heart_rate DESC

SELECT
  AVG(systolic_pressure) AS avg_systolic,
  AVG(diastolic_pressure) AS avg_diastolic
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)

SELECT
  AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp) AS "time",
  patient_id,
  AVG(blood_glucose) AS avg_glucose
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', timestamp), patient_id
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT
  ROUND(
    100.0 * COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE oxygen_saturation < 90) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0),
    2
  ) AS low_o2_percentage
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)

SELECT
  unit,
  COUNT(*) AS num_events
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY unit
ORDER BY num_events DESC

panels.title: Número de eventos por unidad médica

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  systolic_pressure AS "Presión Sistólica",
  diastolic_pressure AS "Presión Diastólica",
  patient_id
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND patient_id = '$patient_id'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  temperature AS "Temperatura",
  patient_id
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND patient_id = '$patient_id'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  oxygen_saturation AS "Saturación de Oxígeno",
  patient_id
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND patient_id = '$patient_id'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  heart_rate AS "Ritmo Cardíaco",
  patient_id
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND patient_id = '$patient_id'
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  blood_glucose AS "Glucosa",
  patient_id
FROM vitales_pacientes
WHERE $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND patient_id = '$patient_id'
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.title: Nivel de glucosa en sangre por paciente

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  v.timestamp AS "time",
  v.alert,
  v.patient_id,
  v.unit,
  a.bacteria_detected
FROM vitales_pacientes v
JOIN analiticas a ON a.patient_id = v.patient_id
WHERE alert IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 20

panels.title: Panel de Alertas recientes con bacterias

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  v.timestamp as time,
  v.patient_id,
  v.systolic_pressure,
  v.diastolic_pressure,
  a.bacteria_detected
FROM vitales_pacientes v
JOIN analiticas a ON a.patient_id = v.patient_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(v.timestamp) AND bacteria_detected = '$bacteria_detected'
ORDER BY v.timestamp

SELECT
  v.timestamp as time,
  v.patient_id,
  v.temperature,
  a.bacteria_detected
FROM vitales_pacientes v
JOIN analiticas a ON a.patient_id = v.patient_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(v.timestamp) AND bacteria_detected = '$bacteria_detected'
ORDER BY v.timestamp

SELECT
  v.timestamp as time,
  v.patient_id,
  v.oxygen_saturation AS "Oxygen Saturation",
  a.bacteria_detected
FROM vitales_pacientes v
JOIN analiticas a ON a.patient_id = v.patient_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(v.timestamp) AND bacteria_detected = '$bacteria_detected'
ORDER BY v.timestamp

SELECT
  v.timestamp as time,
  v.patient_id,
  v.heart_rate AS "Heart Rate",
  a.bacteria_detected
FROM vitales_pacientes v
JOIN analiticas a ON a.patient_id = v.patient_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(v.timestamp) AND bacteria_detected = '$bacteria_detected'
ORDER BY v.timestamp

SELECT
  v.timestamp as time,
  v.patient_id,
  v.blood_glucose AS "Glucosa",
  a.bacteria_detected
FROM vitales_pacientes v
JOIN analiticas a ON a.patient_id = v.patient_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(v.timestamp) AND bacteria_detected = '$bacteria_detected'
ORDER BY v.timestamp

SELECT DISTINCT vp.patient_id,
       vp.timestamp,
       vp.blood_glucose,
       a.bacteria_detected,
       ar.antibiotic_name,
       ar.resistance_level
FROM vitales_pacientes vp
JOIN analiticas a ON vp.patient_id = a.patient_id
JOIN antibiotic_res ar ON a.analitica_id = ar.analitica_id
WHERE vp.blood_glucose > 140
  AND vp.timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
  AND a.bacteria_detected ILIKE '$bacteria_detected'
  AND ar.resistance_level ILIKE '%resistente%'
ORDER BY vp.timestamp DESC
LIMIT 20;

panels.title: Pacientes con glucosa elevada en eventos recientes con bacterias resistentes

targets.rawSql:
WITH pacientes_signos_alterados AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature, oxygen_saturation, systolic_pressure, diastolic_pressure, blood_glucose
  FROM vitales_pacientes
  WHERE heart_rate NOT BETWEEN 60 AND 100
     OR temperature >= 35 AND temperature <= 42
     OR oxygen_saturation < 90
     OR systolic_pressure > 140
     OR diastolic_pressure > 90
     OR blood_glucose > 150
),
diagnosticos_complejos AS (
  SELECT patient_id, COUNT(bacteria_detected) AS "recuento_bacterias"
  FROM analiticas
  GROUP BY patient_id
  HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT bacteria_detected) >= 2
)
SELECT 
  ps.patient_id,
  ps.heart_rate,
  ps.temperature,
  ps.oxygen_saturation,
  ps.systolic_pressure,
  ps.diastolic_pressure,
  ps.blood_glucose,
  dc.recuento_bacterias
FROM pacientes_signos_alterados ps
JOIN diagnosticos_complejos dc ON ps.patient_id = dc.patient_id;

panels.title: Pacientes que tienen signos vitales alterados y han recibido diagnósticos microbiológicos complejos

targets.rawSql:
SELECT vp.patient_id,
       vp.timestamp,
       vp.temperature,
       a.sample_date,
       a.bacteria_detected
FROM vitales_pacientes vp
JOIN analiticas a ON vp.patient_id = a.patient_id
WHERE vp.temperature >= 35 OR vp.temperature <= 42
  AND DATE(vp.timestamp) = a.sample_date
  AND a.bacteria_detected IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY vp.timestamp DESC;

panels.title: ¿Coincide una alta temperatura en eventos con una muestra positiva de alguna bacteria?
